display.name: RGW Instance Throughput (GET/PUT)
display.description: Total bytes transferred in/out through get/put operations, by radosgw instance

spec.query:
(
  sum by (bucket) (rate(radosgw_bytes_sent{tenant="all", user="all"}[$__rate_interval])) +
  sum by (bucket) (rate(radosgw_bytes_received{tenant="all", user="all"}[$__rate_interval]))
) or
(
  sum by (bucket) (rate(radosgw_bytes_sent{tenant="all", user="all"}[$__rate_interval])) or 
  sum by (bucket) (rate(radosgw_bytes_received{tenant="all", user="all"}[$__rate_interval]))
)

(
  sum by (user) (rate(radosgw_bytes_sent{user!="all"}[$__rate_interval])) +
  sum by (user) (rate(radosgw_bytes_received{user!="all"}[$__rate_interval]))
) or
(
  sum by (user) (rate(radosgw_bytes_sent{user!="all"}[$__rate_interval])) or 
  sum by (user) (rate(radosgw_bytes_received{user!="all"}[$__rate_interval]))
)

display.name: Top 10 - Amount Of Objects Per User
